Keywords: Cosmic , Fantastic Four
Real Name: Franklin Richards
Special Powers
RETURN OF THE FANTASTIC FOUR: Friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword within 4 squares have Power Cosmic team ability.
MAYBE I'M FINALLY ORDINARY: Franklin Richards can't be equipped and can only be healed by Regeneration or the Fantastic Four team ability. // The first time Franklin Richards would be KO'd by his own unavoidable damage, instead turn him to click #11.
EVERYTIME I USE MY POWERS, I GET CLOSER TO LOSING THEM: FREE: Choose 3 standard powers. Franklin Richards can use the chosen powers until your next turn. // At the end of your turn, if Franklin Richards activated this power or made an attack, roll a d6. Deal him unavoidable damage equal to half the result.

Comments
May 12, 2021
Goop
So this guy got kind of a buff/nerf with the new rules, since pushing is gone Power Cosmic isn't as wonderful as before, but you do now gain the new willpower which could potentially remove a lot of tokens off your whole team. I still say the best plan is to just keep in the back protecting your team from outwit. Maybe occasionally bring him out with hypersonic/RCE/prob and then run him back. That way you dont have to choose def powers.
February 22, 2021
specialmagic
This piece is fantastic. Thematic, interesting, and very useable.
February 20, 2021
Goop
I dont like this piece, it just seems way too difficult to "make work". Maybe if he was lower cost or had some generic powers already but having 0 at default you will always need to pick powers and be taking random amounts of damage and stats falling because of it. Keeping him in the back protecting a large team from outwit is likely his best strength.
October 31, 2020
Vigilante
Franklin is a blast to play. So many options, but you have to be careful with him at the same time. A very accurate and playable piece!
